bio:
I understand how important it is to have unique content which is free of plagiarism, easy to read, with the ultimate goal of generating more traffic to your site. No one does it better. With my vast intellectual standing and experience, I deliver only the best and I have been able to create an unparalleled niche for myself in the world of creative and copywriting. Being a creative writer driven with the passion to provide exceptional content for my clients, a productive routine is what fuels me mentally to do more and hence I have invariably been an active part of extramural activities throughout my academic life. Professionally, I have been engaging in copywriting and freelancing projects since 2012.

Moreover, I have worked as data entry manager, and having worked in financial and marketing fields’ I have a sharp grasp at diversified range of respective niches.

I have also worked on tons of  eBooks, blogs and articles including content for leading international brands and companies.  My expertise with writing has been fruitful for various corporate enterprises and teams with whom I have had the privilege of working with.

Conclusively, I am an efficient team worker with a hedonistic approach to problems all the while being clad with leadership skills. I hope this profile has offered you meaningful and precise insight into me as a person and a worker.

Client satisfaction is my top most priority and this is the hallmark of my success.I believe in respecting my clients, understanding their needs and living up to their expectations. By maintaining high standard of ethics in my work values, I deliver great business and optimized services. 

 We can commence business on a solid platform free of disappointments. I’m only a “hello” away. Available to work at any hour of the day, you can simply reach out to me on Guru. Now, lets begin. Shall we?

abstrac: Illustration with a uniquely different flavor
bio:
As a practicing Creative Director/Art Director/ senior artist/designer, illustrator/ photographer and video/editor, project manager, freelancer and author who has owned and run a successful business in the creative field as you see from the attached resume, 
I’ve worn a lot of different hats, from creative leadership to web design and all things in-between. I’m extremely motivated, organized and disciplined. On an individual level, I believe “openness to experience” as the single most important trait of exceptionally creative people. To have a high tolerance for uncertainty, which is as important an asset in creativity as openness to experience. To not know what lies ahead, gives us the fire to continue to create. Last but not least is cognitive flexibility, which is the ability to see the world of design and Illustration with new eyes. To view obstacles as opportunities! To transform random events, even mistakes, into the chance to veer in an entirely new and unexpected direction. To keep my mind and eyes open for new design and illustration experiences. No matter where I’ve been, I’ve produced topnotch work. Whether it’s promotional work for external clients or internal corporate leave behinds, I pride myself on my ability to recognize and articulate a distinct voice for every project. And that’s not always restricted to the design.  To speak of a creative leader or manger, is a paradox. Creativity is chaotic and unrestrained while leadership is orderly and controlling, and setting the two together makes for a potentially volatile combination. But it’s what being a senior creative is all about. I relish the opportunity to lead and be creative, to embrace innovation and creativity as central missions of a company such as yours. As a published author in the field of illustration, the most important thing is a position where my contributions count and my efforts are appreciated – and hopefully a long-term commitment in creativity.
I operate 40hours a day......from 9 am - 5pm

abstrac: we get work done, Quickly and Accurately. Very professional, competent, and with a high turnaround rate. we're always available to serve our clients.
bio:
In 2020, a group of 10 professionals from different backgrounds came together to start a company in Kenya. The group consisted of marketers,  software developers,  financial analysts,  graphic designers, project managers, social media managers, and an environmentalist. They saw an opportunity to provide a wide range of services to clients in various sectors online.

The company began as a small start-up with just a few clients. However, over the years, it grew steadily and gained a reputation for providing high-quality services to its clients. As the company expanded, the shareholders invested more money into the business and brought on new talent to help it grow.

1. Daily feedback on the work down
2. Weekly payment method
3. Safe pay for new clients is required
4. Recommendations after work will be appreciated
